text: The following lists events that happened during 1977 in Cape Verde. ==Incumbents== *President: Aristides Pereira *Prime Minister: Pedro Pires ==Events== ==Sports== *CS Mindelense won the Cape Verdean Football Championship ==Births== *January 31: Vadú (d. 2010), singer *June 15: Rui Monteiro, footballer ==References== Category:Years of the 20th century in Cape Verde Category:1970s in Cape Verde Cape Verde Cape Verde
title: 1977 in Cape Verde
